triples.name: Model-driven engineering
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes the state of research, practice, and art in MDE over the last 10 years and identifies grand challenges in the field.

triples.name: Software engineering
triples.relevance: MDE is a subfield of software engineering, and the paper examines software engineering practices and challenges related to model-driven approaches.

triples.name: Engineering
triples.relevance: Engineering principles underpin the model-driven engineering methodology discussed as the core subject of the survey.
